channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NPR wants to know: What is a key lesson you learned this year?
item.description: The year is coming to a close, which can bring a lot of reflection. What went great and what might have gone sideways? Every year we learn lessons on ...

item.title: West African bloc approves historic exit of military-run states
item.description: Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger will leave the Ecowas group in January but have six months to return.

item.title: Survivors seek a reckoning as FBI investigates child sex abuse in little-known Christian sect
item.description: A small Christian sect that for decades was little noticed by the outside world has found itself riven by a very public child sex abuse scandal.

item.title: Defense Sec. Austin says he sees diversity in military as a strength in face of Hegseth criticisms

item.title: Israeli strikes kill 50 in Gaza, Hamas-run health ministry says
item.description: The Israeli military says Sunday's strikes targeted sites used by Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad.

item.title: Dec 16: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: RFK Jr. to face scrutiny over vaccines and abortion rights; Airports preparing for busy holiday travel rush.

item.title: U.S. warship docks in Cambodia for first time in 8 years
item.description: The USS Savannah docked just miles away from a Chinese-renovated naval base.

item.title: Trump announces Japanese firm SoftBank plans to invest $100 billion in U.S.

item.title: Mayotte feels like nuclear war aftermath since cyclone, residents say
item.description: Rescuers comb through the debris in the French Indian Ocean territory hit by the worst storm in 90 years.

item.title: These global stories were very, very, very popular in 2024

item.title: Austria striker's skull is fractured during attack
item.description: Austria and Rapid Vienna striker Guido Burgstaller had his skull fractured when he was attacked in the centre of Vienna.

item.title: Two Russian oil tankers wrecked in Black Sea
item.description: Video appears to show one of the tankers broken in half and sinking amid a heavy storm, with oil visible in the water.

item.title: Drone sightings lead to airspace shutdown at Ohio military base, arrests near Boston airport
